body:
This started this week, and now my bitcoin aq 1.10.0 will not start at all.

2015-04-26 10:58:47 UPnP Port Mapping successful.
2015-04-26 11:02:07 ERROR: ProcessNewBlock : ActivateBestChain failed
2015-04-26 11:02:07 Loaded 43256 blocks from external file in 26654168ms
2015-04-26 11:02:07 Reindexing block file blk00001.dat...
2015-04-26 11:02:07 socket send error An operation was attempted on something that is not a socket.  (10038)
2015-04-26 11:02:07 opencon thread interrupt
2015-04-26 11:02:07 dumpaddr thread stop
2015-04-26 11:02:07 addcon thread interrupt
2015-04-26 11:02:07 msghand thread interrupt
2015-04-26 11:02:07 net thread interrupt
2015-04-26 11:02:07 Shutdown: In progress...
2015-04-26 11:02:07 StopNode()
2015-04-26 11:02:07 UPNP_DeletePortMapping() returned : 0
2015-04-26 11:02:07 upnp thread interrupt
2015-04-26 11:02:07 IO error: WinMmapFile.Sync::FlushFileBuffers: : The semaphore timeout period has expired.


2015-04-26 11:02:07 *** System error while flushing: Database I/O error
2015-04-26 11:02:09 Shutdown: done
2015-04-26 11:02:16 GUI: "registerShutdownBlockReason: Successfully registered: Bitcoin Core didn't yet exit safely..." 
2015-04-26 11:02:16
title: ERROR: ProcessNewBlock : ActivateBestChain failed
